name: Formula Race: Blocky Cars Rush
description:
Pedal to the metal, and burn Your retro pixel tires !:)

Controls:
Swipe Your finger up or down to avoid trucks
Swipe Your finger right for turbo!

Test Your driving skills in this retro arcade style crazy game,
inspired by computer amiga 600 and retro style games like Lotus etc.

Collect power up that will transform Your formula car into a TANK! :D
now You can shoot into trucks so You don't have to avoid them any more

There is also a lot more power up in game like slow motion

Good Luck and race to unlock all Formula cars
Download now and have fun
